com.facebook.buck.core.model.actiongraph.computation

Class ActionGraphProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.model.actiongraph.computation.ActionGraphProvider

  • public class ActionGraphProvider
extends Object
    Class that transforms TargetGraph to ActionGraph. It also holds a cache for the last ActionGraph it generated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActionGraphProvider(BuckEventBus eventBus, ActionGraphFactory actionGraphFactory, ActionGraphCache actionGraphCache, RuleKeyConfiguration ruleKeyConfiguration, boolean checkActionGraphs, boolean skipActionGraphCache, IncrementalActionGraphMode incrementalActionGraphMode) 
      ActionGraphProvider(BuckEventBus eventBus, ActionGraphFactory actionGraphFactory, ActionGraphCache actionGraphCache, RuleKeyConfiguration ruleKeyConfiguration, BuckConfig buckConfig) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Create an ActionGraph, using options extracted from a BuckConfig.

      It returns an ActionGraphAndBuilder.
      ActionGraphAndBuilder getFreshActionGraph(TargetGraph targetGraph)
      * It returns a new ActionGraphAndBuilder based on the targetGraph without checking the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getActionGraph

        public ActionGraphAndBuilder getActionGraph(TargetGraph targetGraph)
        Create an ActionGraph, using options extracted from a BuckConfig.

      • getActionGraph

        public ActionGraphAndBuilder getActionGraph(TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer transformer,
                                            TargetGraph targetGraph,
                                            Optional<ThriftRuleKeyLogger> ruleKeyLogger)
        It returns an ActionGraphAndBuilder. If the targetGraph exists in the cache it returns a cached version of the ActionGraphAndBuilder, else returns a new one and updates the cache.
        Parameters:
        targetGraph - the target graph that the action graph will be based on.
        Returns:
        a ActionGraphAndBuilder

      • getFreshActionGraph

        public ActionGraphAndBuilder getFreshActionGraph(TargetGraph targetGraph)
        * It returns a new ActionGraphAndBuilder based on the targetGraph without checking the cache. It uses a DefaultTargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer.
        Parameters:
        targetGraph - the target graph that the action graph will be based on.
        Returns:
        a ActionGraphAndBuilder

      • getFreshActionGraph

        public ActionGraphAndBuilder getFreshActionGraph(TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer transformer,
                                                 TargetGraph targetGraph)
        It returns a new ActionGraphAndBuilder based on the targetGraph without checking the cache. It uses a custom TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer.
        Parameters:
        transformer - Custom TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer that the transformation will be based on.
        targetGraph - The target graph that the action graph will be based on.
        Returns:
        It returns a ActionGraphAndBuilder
